sentences.cn: 他的尸体进行了防腐处理。

sentences.en: The Egyptians used to embalm the bodies of their dead kings.
sentences.cn: 埃及人以前用药物保存国王的尸体.

sentences.en: The Egyptians used to embalm the bodies of their deadkings and queens.
sentences.cn: 埃及人以前用药物保存国王和王后的尸体.

sentences.en: Thousands of years ago in Egypt, salt was used to embalm the dead.
sentences.cn: 千万年前埃及人曾利用盐涂尸防腐.

sentences.en: We must embalm the master's wise opinions.
sentences.cn: 这位大师的崇论闳议,我们一定要铭记于心.

words.tran_cn: （用于防止尸体腐化的）香料或化学物质

trans.tran_cn: 铭记于心；使不朽；防腐；使充满香气
trans.tran_en: to treat a dead body with chemicals, oils etc to prevent it from decaying

trans.tran_cn: 保存（尸体）不腐，使不被遗忘，使充满香气
